name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Step into a whimsical world with the Fairy Mushroom House live wallpaper.

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fairy Mushroom House Bring the magic of a fairy tale to your Chrome with this enchanting mushroom house live wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into a whimsical world with the "Fairy Mushroom House" live wallpaper. This delightful scene features a cozy mushroom house surrounded by fairy lights and soft, glowing mushrooms. Perfect for adding a touch of magic and serenity to your browser, this wallpaper transports you to a forest of dreams where fairies and fantasy come to life.

**Key Features:**
- **Popular Website Shortcuts**: Easily access your favorite websites directly from the wallpaper with quick shortcuts.
- **Date and Time Display**: Stay updated with a beautiful clock and date feature that blends harmoniously into the magical landscape.

Ideal for nature lovers, fantasy enthusiasts, and those who crave a peaceful and enchanting vibe, this extension transforms your browsing experience. Download "Fairy Mushroom House" today and let the magic of the forest fill your screen!
